::Rixer/Hot Rod::

Rixer rolls to the side avoiding the shots.

As Speed Viper swings Hot Rod jumps high above the swings. He comes down
behind Speed Viper, and turns around. He fires off four laser at Speed
Vipers back, at point blank range.
